name: Lexical this
description:
Lexical this

Complete the Person object, by completing the FillFriends function to fill the _friends Array for the person object.

Output

Return the person object with the Name, Friends and FillFriends function filled out which will fill the input into the Friends property. Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Functions/Arrow_functions
